description:
Immerse yourself in a magical tale with full-color illustrations that come to life in "Interactive Book Mode."

·Experience an extended version of the Little Mermaid story with exciting twists in "The Little Mermaid Story Mode."

·Beautiful underwater images in "Screen Mode", where the images scroll automatically.

·Enjoy the atmosphere with an immersive soundtrack that includes 7 music tracks to listen to while you explore this underwater world.


This video game offers an immersive and versatile experience based on the classic tale of The Little Mermaid, allowing you to enjoy the story in multiple ways and immerse yourself in its unique atmosphere.
name: The Little Mermaid: Visual Harmony
